full_threads.body:
Thanks for all of your help 😊

MARGARET GOULD​

ADMIN OFFICER

E.

Margaret.Gould@royalrehab.com.au

Hi Margie, 

I'm glad to hear that! Thanks for confirming that it is now working. Cheers!

Hi Rica

I have just received a fax referral from the Day Program in box this is the second one today so it seems to be ok now.

Many thanks

Margie.

MARGARET GOULD​

ADMIN OFFICER

E.

Margaret.Gould@royalrehab.com.au

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Pending

full_threads.body:
Hi Trudy,

Sure. We have checked the Day Rehab referral form and test it, it seems that it's properly working. If you haven't received the email notification in your Inbox, please check your Spam/Junk folder.

Please let us know if you need further assistance.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
HI Support,


We have been advised emails to Day Rehab on the website are not coming through.


The Day Rehab referral form https://royalrehab.com.au/private-hospital/referrals-and-admissions/referral-form/ are to go to DayRehabilitation@royalrehab.com.au.


Please could you check.


Kind regards,


Trudy.
TRUDY MCENEARNEY​
MARKETING AND COMMUNICATIONS MANAGER
235 Morrison Road
Ryde
NSW
2112
D.
+61 2 9808 9356
E.
 Trudy.McEnearney@Royalrehab.com.au








From: Martina Fox <Martina.Fox@Royalrehab.com.au>
Sent: Monday, 21 September 2020 12:24 PM
To: Servicedesk External <helpdesk@royalrehab.freshservice.com>
Cc: Trudy McEnearney <Trudy.McEnearney@Royalrehab.com.au>; Margaret Gould <Margaret.Gould@Royalrehab.com.au>
Subject: RE: New referrals for Day Program


Good afternoon Mark


Private Hospital Inpatient referrals are meant to be emailed to referrals@royalrehab.com.au.


If after checking this email address you still encounter problems then please advise and so I can refer this issue to our web design support, WP Perk support@wpperk.com.


Cheers



MARTINA FOX​
COMMUNITY RELATIONS MANAGER
235 Morrison Rd
Ryde
NSW
2112
D.
+61 2 9808 9377
M.
 0434 845 427
E.
 Martina.Fox@Royalrehab.com.au








From: Mark McVeigh <helpdesk@royalrehab.freshservice.com>
Sent: Sunday, 20 September 2020 9:57 PM
To: Martina Fox <Martina.Fox@Royalrehab.com.au>
Subject: Fwd: New referrals for Day Program


Martina,


Margie has informed us she hasnt been recieving any emails from the websites referral form.. Can you tell me what the from email address is so I can check our mail security logs.



Regards, Mark





On Mon, 14 Sep at 10:28 AM , Margaret.gould <margaret.gould@royalrehab.com.au> wrote:
Hello I T

I have a couple of enquires regarding new referrals entered on our website but have not come into the Dayrehab email inbox?
Can you please check that the system is working ?

Thanks
Margie.


MARGARET GOULD​
ADMIN OFFICER
E.
Margaret.Gould@Royalrehab.com.au
